das.shapes

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • das.shapes.Shape
      • das.shapes.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Shape
    This class models a Rectangle. It can perform common calculations as well as drawing a representation of the rectangle to a Processing PApplet.
    Version:
    10/9/19
    Author:
    Pallavi Das

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle()
      Creates a default instance of a Rectangle object with all dimensions set to zero
      Rectangle(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double calcArea()
      Calculates and returns the area of the shape
      double calcPerimeter()
      Calculates and returns the perimeter of the shape
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
      Draws a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at getX() and getX() + getWidth().
      java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double getCenter()
      Calculates and returns the center point of the shape
      double getHeight()
      Returns the height of the shape
      double getWidth()
      Returns the width of the shape
      boolean isPointInside(double x, double y)
      Determines whether the point x,y is contained inside the shape

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle()
        Creates a default instance of a Rectangle object with all dimensions set to zero

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height)
        Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle
        y - y-coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle
        width - width of the rectangle
        height - height of the rectangle

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        Draws a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at getX() and getX() + getWidth(). The top and bottom edges are at getY() and getY() + getHeight().
        Specified by:
        draw in class Shape
        Parameters:
        drawer - the PApplet to be used to draw the rectangle
        Precondition:
        drawer must not be null, and appropriate settings should have been selected (color, fill, etc)
        Postcondition:
        the drawer will have its rectangle mode modified to PApplet.CORNER

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(double x,
                             double y)
        Description copied from class: Shape
        Determines whether the point x,y is contained inside the shape
        Specified by:
        isPointInside in class Shape
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the point to check
        y - the y-coordinate of the point to check
        Returns:
        true if the point (x,y) is contained inside, or on the border, of this shape
